MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:29pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:36pm on Monday, 22 March 2021
